amendment.description: To reauthorize the Education Flexibility Partnership Act of 1999.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2227 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2227 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097) To reauthorize the Education Flexibility Partnership Act of 1999.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2227 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2227 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2089.
